responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain interactive and visually appealing Power BI dashboards and reports.

Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in data visualization and analytics.
skills: Proficiency in Amazon QuickSight, including data preparation, visualizations, and report generation.

Experience with SQL and data querying techniques.
Familiarity with data warehousing concepts and tools.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
